name: Reid Hoffman
title: Partner & LinkedIn Guy
archetypeDescription: Built the world's largest professional cringe repository and somehow made billions

moves.name: Blitzscaling Bomb
moves.effect: Burns cash faster than opponent can react

moves.name: LinkedIn Connection
moves.effect: Forces opponent to accept unwanted networking request

flavor: Created a platform where people unironically write 'I'm humbled to announce' and it's worth more than most countries.
bangerQuote: Invented the place where your weird uncle posts motivational quotes next to crypto scams, and VCs call it 'professional networking'.
roastBullets: Made a website for job hunting and somehow it became a platform for people to write 5-paragraph posts about being fired
Blitzscaled his way through every ethical question by just going faster
Wrote a book about networks and then invested in AI that might make networks obsolete
